result.arabic_text: قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدَۢا بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرَۢا بَصِيرٗا
result.translation: 96. Nabiyow! keenik (koros kinnuk) ixxic: Yalli yoo kee sin fanal anu nummah kay farmoyta kinniyoomuh sumaaqah xiqqi yoo haa, diggah usuk isi naqoosah adda yaaxigi ken taamoomi yabali kinni.
